name: Ezerra Ointment (25g) for eczema
description:
Ezerra Ointment is a powerful ointment that offers relief for dry and irritated skin condition. Enriched with itch-relieving natural key ingredients for maximum efficacy, this product is formulated with a thicker texture, making it ideal for night time usage.

Non steroidal, fragrance-free and suitable for extended use on babies as young as 2 weeks old. Use this as an essential spot treatment for everyday maintenance and care for dry and irritated skin condition.

What It Does:
>Provides relief from itchiness.
>Ensures intense and lasting moisturisation by keeping skin adequately hydrated.
>Keeps skin calm and comfortable.

Key ingredients:
>Stimutex-AS, a naturally-derived component that contains sensitive skin-relieving properties to provide relief from itchiness and irritation of the skin.
>Tocopheryl Acetate, a form of Vitamin E is a natural skin-conditioning agent that works to moisturise and maintain a healthy skin condition.

How To Use:
Clean the skin with Ezerra Extra Gentle Cleanser and apply 2-3 times a day on affected areas where the skin is dry, itchy or red. Lightly dab and spread the ointment with your fingers. Use regularly for optimum results.

If there are signs of bacteria getting under the skin (yellowish fluid), please see your doctor or dermatologist to address the issue. Best paired with Ezerra Lotion for all-over lasting moisturisation to the skin.

If your child suffers from extremely scratched skin instead, we recommend using Ezerra Plus Cream.
